text:
"Yo bro! Ki haal chaal?" jab bhi milta yahi bolta tha. Vahi raat ko headphones laga ke bag ke saath Hall 2 ke gate pe milta tha. And then we used to start our walk. Pata hi nahi chalta tha ki kab 2-3 ghante ho gaye. And kya random topics pe discussion karte the apan, be it courses, life, friends aur na jaane kya kya. And discuss karte karte jab do raaste aa jaate the to kya randomly choose karte the apan ki kaha jaana hai. Vo din hamesha yaad rahenge.

Hamesha aise hi rehna bro! Jaise abhi tak walks pe chale hai, vaise hi aage bhi chalte rahenge, milte rahenge, baatein karenge aur hamesha ki tarah workaround nikal hi lenge. Cheers!
author: Ram  Goyal
